channel.title: Runeiverse[InsidiaX src][20+ players][VPS][602 gfx][cust. interfaces][sexy site]
channel.description:
[img]http://img685.imageshack.us/img685/6356/sitelogori.png[/img]
A team for a good RSPS is in development. The server is currently need some ADVERTISERS. This server is like no other. Everything about it is unique and fun to play. I have had some *beta testers* come in and check it out and 90% of them said that the server was better than most that they currently play on. It's a 317 with 602 gfx (PI base). Hopefully soon it can kick some other servers asses. Economy is our main priority here at Runeiverse. We will do our best to make it as flawless as possible. Once my server expands, (which it will easily) it will be needing some more staff. The server has great potential and we are really looking forward to the fun experience the server will produce. Current site: www.runeiverse.net webclient is NOW WORKING
Youtube vid: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CsvddrX8FO4 Client Download link: http://uppit.com/78m47b5cimcp/Runeiverse_Client.rar This is what the server currently has: 634 items added 602 gfx added 602 emotes added 602 npcs [size=12pt]Ancient curses rewritten, with perfect formulas![/size] All items now wieldable and have the right requirements Godwars dungeon added with all minions and boss drops all the godsword spec anims all bugs (that i know of) Fixed all dupes (that i know of) Changed Exp rate from 300 to 800 + the server bonus, fairly good exp rate Cut down on some of the cache memory Autocache downloads now Added a new starter that gives 50 to any combat stat you wish [size=12pt]Perfect switching[/size] Ability to Rush Redid some drops and drop rates Autocasting redone Added new gfx and emote to teleports Warriors guild Chaotics & Korasi Fixed glowing in the mage book 600+ revision gameframe New skys Donator zone and tab which includes: changing your spell book (if not in pvp) a teleport to donator zone and a insta-kc for GWD
Corporeal beast New donator shop with dragons Brimhaven agility course added PvP drops An NPC to reset stats Tormented demons Baby Drags Skillcape emotes DFS special Spirit shield effects Staff of light Bad ass banking interface A Great login box Background switching Barrows Pest Control [size=12pt]Frost Dragons with working Frost bones[/size] Tzhaar fight pits! Duel Arena Great slayer skill and Slayer Tower Brimhaven dungeon Taverly dungeon Ancients Xp counter Easy commands WORKING Hand-Cannon Strykewurms [size=12pt]Custom Jail[/size]
Bossing is crazy cool on this server. i've added some tough bosses that you can build up to with some antagonizing drop rates. Imagine this: [size=14pt]Nomad Kalphite Queen Sea Troll Queen Plane-freezer Lahkhrahnaz 3/4 Gwd Bosses Daggonath kings King Black Dragon Tormented Demons The Giant Sea Snake Jad[/size]
I am currently in progress of developing some good ideas like...: Chaotic defenders and armor More Spirit shields, striped colors and different effects striped, or checkered p hats guthix 2h sword(like ss) zamorak 2h sword chaotic 2h sword daily raffles and gifts caskets (sellable) that can give you shit, or something really good.(rare) and MUCH more.
I currently have PLAYER OWNED SHOPS [size=24pt]working[/size] [img]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/4716/56748716.png[/img] All Specs work [img]http://img808.imageshack.us/img808/8488/29vgd53.png[/img] [img]http://img543.imageshack.us/img543/5483/2i88acy.png[/img] [img]http://img220.imageshack.us/img220/5493/263k2yr.png[/img] [img]http://img5.imageshack.us/img5/5522/otherj.png[/img]
The staff so far:
Owner: 1/1 - Brandon Co-owner:1/1 - Gavon Gfx: 1/1 Bloody death coders: 2/2 - Brandon, EclipseRuins Admin: 1/1 - Trenton moderator: 3/3 Bloody death, muller220 web designer: 1/1 - EclipseRuins Advertisers 0/3
Since i can't do everything on my own i am looking for some staff. I'm in desperate need of some good advertisers
So say you want to be apart of the exclusive Runeiverse staff:
You will need to reply to this post with the information filled out below.
[code]Applying for?: Why should we choose you?: Will you stay dedicated?: Age: Do you think you can get along with other staff?: How many hours a day are you usually on?: Skype? If yes, put your name please: Proof of any work?: additional comments: [/code]
credits to asshole rule for 3 pics
Comments, Criticism, Concerns are highly recommended if/if not applying to the team Thanks -Runeiverse Team

item.title: Runeiverse[InsidiaX src][20+ players][VPS][602 gfx][cust. interfaces][sexy site]
item.dc:creator: @EclipseRuins EclipseRuins
item.description:
@EclipseRuins wrote:

Applying for?: Professional Website Design and Forums (Social Network aswell)

Why should we choose you?: I coded my own Social Network front to back in 3 months from scratch and i got a job offer to do the same with Ubisoft. I want to implement my Social network into your server, so you would have a very nice and clean RuneiverseSocial (Or whatever you’d like to call it) Where people can host player owned shops, start clans, declare clan battles, post about drop parties to the public (This is not a Forums, look at the proof of any work section)

Will you stay dedicated?: Yes, of course.

Age: 14 (Don’t let my age fool you)

Do you think you can get along with other staff?: Of course, very friendly and i’m just laid back and chilled at all times, get the work done and then move on with the next. (I usually like to make guides for the server and help users aswell)

How many hours a day are you usually on?: Depends really, most servers that i like i spend about 2-3 hours on the server playing and helping people then 2-3 hours coding or typing up guides for the server.

Skype? If yes, put your name please: aj.cordio

Years with Java: 2

Java knowledge?(1/10): 6

Proof of any work?: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,529925.0.html

Additional Comments: The above link is a post i made recently asking if anyone would like to test drive my Social Network for their RSPS, so basically i will merge your RSPS with a Social Network (Give users the Social Network to go on and easily sell stuff, and share. Read some on the link for more information and ideas)

NOTE: The Social Network is completed, my version what is for general use amongst the public is called Cagoi. When i make yours it will be custom, user friendly, and based on your RSPS.

Skype: aj.cordio
Email: skill3d@live.com

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:53, topic:426098”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=528788.msg3861794#msg3861794 date=1324703322]

Whoever is going to Pay or “Compensate” someone if they inexperienced on your servers base is idiotic.

I’m sure if I have 5 1/2 year(s) of experience, I’m going to be able to program a PI base. I’m in-experienced with PI, because I’ve never used it.
[/quote][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=528788.msg3861786#msg3861786 date=1324703188]
If you’re inexperienced with a certain base really means nothing, if you’re inexperienced with Java and you pay him to program - now that’s idiotic.
[/quote]

If you’re good at Java, you’re good at any base.[/quote]

I’m not disputing that. I’m going to stop replying before I break my keyboard in half over my head.
